articles.description: Santa Fe police are investigating the death of actor Gene Hackman and his wife, pianist Betsy Arakawa, after the couple and one of their dogs were found dead at home.
articles.content: Authorities in Santa Fe are investigating the death of Oscar-winning actor Gene Hackman and his wife, the classical pianist Betsy Arakawa, after the couple and one of their dogs were discovered dead … [+3991 chars]

articles.title: Michelle Trachtenberg’s Family Denies Autopsy for Late Actress - Vulture
